name: ElectriX: Electro Mechanic Simulator
detailed_description:
ElectriX - Craft New Devices with 3D Printer



In ElectriX player wlll be able to craft new devices using 3D Printer and parts bought in electro-shops or auctions.

https://youtu.be/ahwSatxs2D4


Electrix - Hack Systems



In the game we will be able to hack courier and miliatry systems to achieve secret information, devices and also to avoid terrorists activities from side stories.

https://youtu.be/UP71kKxCrKk


ElectriX - CryptoMiner New Feature



CryptoMiner - a new feature in Electrix - Electro Mechanic Simulator from our studio SimFabric.

As a player we'll be able to buy CryptoMiner, Upgrade it with new better GPUs and install to dig crypto currency.

Crypto currency will be necessary to buy Hacking Services & Devices in the game.

https://youtu.be/VOuy2y_u6hI


ElectriX - Fix & Play Retro Electronic Games

In ElectriX you can hack fixed mobiles and watch secrets movies with clues to side-stories.



https://youtu.be/mChv8NxcO9M


ElectriX - Fix & Fly Test Drones

In ElectriX you can hack fixed mobiles and watch secrets movies with clues to side-stories.



https://youtu.be/U-Gp0kL1TV0


ElectriX - Test & Play Games

In ElectriX you can test fixed consoles and play games on them.



https://youtu.be/ifryQ7LbS_I


ElectriX - Fix Mobiles

Sometimes fixing mobile doesn't end well.



https://youtu.be/0sIxnTkxTx0


ElectriX - Hack and Watch Secrets

In ElectriX you can hack fixed mobiles and watch secrets movies with clues to side-stories.



https://youtu.be/3SXb4Po7e2U


ElectriX - Fix, Test & Play retro computers

In ElectriX you can test fixed retro computers and play games on them.



https://youtu.be/rO6WDgS0wLk


New ElectriX trailer

New ElectriX trailer - with a list of features.


https://youtu.be/kSHDnQH5uHo


ElectriX is Alive!

Dear Friends,

We are working very hard on our game and from next month we plan to publish regular information on our ElectriX project.



To present proof of the life of our project, we publish a new concept art of the game - we hope you enjoy it.

ElectriX team


The most popular retro console - Voting

In the first voting for the most popular retro console, Playstation wins.



On the second place was Nintendo Entertainment System

and third place took Gameboy.

Thank You all for your votes.

Next voting soon.

Checkout the website of ElectriX publisher http://www.playway.com


About the Game

ElectriX: Electro Mechanic Simulator - a simulation game of electronic equipment repair with a dark conspiracy twist. In the game we'll be able to fix modern and retro electronic devices like: consoles, computers, mobile phones and other electronic equipment. During our casual work we will be involved in the dark conspiracy intrigue and only our skills and knowledge will help us. Come to ElectriX to fix some electro stuff!






Game features:

- Over 40 unique devices with skin permutations which give player over 100 different devices to fix
- Zoom in and admire every part from up close
- You can't just simply click your way through the task, you have to be careful not to brake something
- Inspect parts to see their condition - after inspection if costs are bigger than client expects, you can cancel order or ask for bigger budget
- Solder broken parts - project and build your own stuff. It's up to you, if it's gonna work
- Buy old devices and repair them just to sell them for a better price
- Buy broken electronics and scrap them for parts to use it later
- Modern and retro electronic equipment
- Hacking and intelligence special devices
- Special courses to achieve new skills necessary in career advance
- To get energy to work you can make and drink coffee
- You can test and play games on fixed consoles
- You can watch secret movies on fixed mobiles
- You can buy CryptoMiner, upgrade it with better GPUs, install and dig Crypto Currency to use it on Hacking services and devices
- Many different tasks to complete. Some are easy but sometimes there is a client that knows nothing and just tells you that the phone sounds weird
- But the most important avoid troubles...
- And get rewards...
- And always look for clues to solve the mystery...
